https://www.designit.com/

Designit is committed to ensuring that all candidates have an equal opportunity to be considered for employment. Please let us know if you need any reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process.

Title: Sr Experience Designer [Remote]
Job_Description:
ABOUT US:

Braintrust is the only network that gives in-demand talent all the freedom of freelance with all the benefits, community and stability of a full-time role. As the first decentralized talent network, our revolutionary Web3 model ensures the community that relies on Braintrust to find work are the same people who own and build it through the blockchain token, BTRST. So unlike other marketplaces that take 20% to 50% of talent earnings, Braintrust allows talent to keep 100% of earnings and to vote on key changes to improve the network. Braintrust is working to change the way freelance works – for good.

JOB TYPE: Freelance, Contract Position (no agencies/C2C - see notes below)
LOCATION: Remote - United States only (TimeZone: EST | Partial overlap)
HOURLY RANGE: Our client is looking to pay $100 – $125/hr
ESTIMATED DURATION: 40h/week - Long term


THE OPPORTUNITY

US ONLY (no exception)

Preferred locations: Charlotte, San Francisco, Boston, NYC, LA, and Atlanta with hybrid work arrangements (in office 3 days a week)

What You’ll Be Working On

However, open to strong remote candidates.

A common purpose guides: to help make financial lives better by connecting clients and communities to the resources they need to succeed. Our Client’s Experience Design (XD) team creates world-class end-to-end digital experiences that are intuitive, innovative, engaging and inclusive.

They are a multi-disciplinary design organization with expertise across product design, user experience, conversational/AI design, creative direction, ux research and user testing, design program management, production design, content strategy, copywriting, and design technology.

The team is constantly defining, iterating, solving problems, and working together to find ways all their digital platforms can empower customers to reach their financial goals by designing and delivering next-level experiences that provide ease, convenience and safety while matching to individual needs and preferences.

As a Senior Designer you will

Design, optimize and deliver useful and elegant best-in-class digital experiences working from a multidisciplinary, holistic perspective from concept to execution and implementation – applying a broad range of product design capabilities across user experience and visual design to craft complete product and experience solutions
Partner with a diverse set of project stakeholders and cross-functional teams – including product management and engineering. Build influence and partnerships with stakeholders outside of ongoing project work.
Collaborate with researchers, technologists, designers and delivery managers across the team
Develop and deliver advanced experience design deliverables across the discovery and delivery design workflow with limited oversight, including: information architectures, user flows, wireframes, high fidelity designs, compositions, design specifications, redlines and prototypes. Deliver exemplary solutions leveraging internal and external best practices and methods.
Design digital experiences across web, mobile web, and native apps (iOS and Android)
Support and leverage evaluative testing across the customer journey, from rapid user testing to usability studies.
Evaluate and benchmark existing product and service experiences.
Participate actively in design critique and be available as a mentor and resource to other designers
Work on multiple complex designs/projects, managing time and expectations with stakeholders across the organization and XD, staying knowledgeable on project and product details. Drive timely, quality delivery by managing multiple projects and actively providing status updates to XD and partner management.
Respect standards, reflect their design system patterns in work and champion best practices while also helping us set visions for innovative digital and technology experiences.
Use excellent visual, communication and storytelling skills. Demonstrate thought leadership by challenging the status-quo, present independently and navigate questions, conceive, pitch, execute creative ideas, patterns and standards.


You’re a Person Who Has (required Skills)

5+ years of industry design experience operating as an end-to-end multidisciplinary product designer, with strong capabilities across a range of design disciplines with a portfolio of designs that you’re proud of
Extensive experience designing multi-channel consumer-facing apps, responsive web and websites including complex system, user, ecommerce and transactional experiences
Expert understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices and rapid ideation processes like Lean UX, Design Sprints, and Agile
A track record for working with cross-functional product development and design teams to ship customer-facing digital products
Ability to design with a design system and within brand guidelines
Experience defining and utilizing quantitative and qualitative data to inform and inspire design
Highly proficient with InVision and Sketch
Financial services experience a plus


And you are a person who:

Is a self-motivated problem solver with a strong work ethic, reliable issue resolution and time management skills with an intense focus on achieving results
Works well with others, builds and nurtures strong relationships and fosters a diverse and inclusive environment
Has a track record of maximizing impact, leading design work, being reflective and inspiring others to do their best work
Has a strong interest in, and aptitude for self-learning new design and technology skills
Demonstrates strong listening, with excellent communication, and presentation skills
Adapts quickly and positively to change


Apply Now!

ABOUT THE HIRING PROCESS:

Qualified candidates will be invited to do a screening interview with the Braintrust staff. We will answer your questions about the project, and our platform. If we determine it is the right fit for both parties, we'll invite you to join the platform and create a profile to apply directly for this project.

C2C Candidates: This role is not available to C2C candidates working with an agency. If you are a professional contractor who has created an LLC/corp around their consulting practice, this is well aligned with Braintrust and we’d welcome your application.

Braintrust values the multitude of talents and perspectives that a diverse workforce brings. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or protected veteran status.

Title: Chief Designer Officer, Interior Design
Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities




About the job Chief Designer Officer, Interior Design




﻿﻿Flagship Store Design and Build and new business model set up




Liaise with appointed ID firm MLA to identify range of product for the 5 concepts
Liaise with MLA to provide suggestion on HQ flagship showroom design concept
Provide design concept and layout for the new dealer showroom
Lead and complete the design library ready for AI design in Designcad (Kujiale)
Lead and complete on developing BIM5.0 for renovation business
Assist and provide design element on new product development such as door system for room, wall panelling, door range and colour for customized furniture.
Assist the development of APP (Real time monitoring Sub-Con, on-site progress update)
Liaise and work closely with future appointed Project Manager of Construction SOPs' development, Sub-Con Training.




Envision new design solutions




Develop strategies and design solutions that differentiate the organisation's capabilities in the market
Drive research efforts to identify emerging trends or issues in the design industry
Align design solutions and offerings with evolving customer needs, technological advancements, and the organisations brand identity
Conceptualise new design solutions and offerings for the organisation




Deliver design aesthetics and quality




Set the overall direction for design aesthetics and user experience
Provide creative direction on the development of prototypes and review prototypes against established design vision
Conceive innovative design aesthetic ideas in collaboration with internal and external stakeholders
Evaluate overall aethetics, effectiveness and viability of design output




Maintain design production quality




Approve all final design production details, samples and prototypes
Provide justification for the features and benefits of the recommended design production solutions
Communicate the impact on design production quality when implementing the recommended design production solutions
Assess technical and design production solutions against established Key Performance Indicators




﻿Drive product development




Oversee the development of product portfolios, and whenever possible, pilot new lines of revenue for the organisation
Innovate new products or evolve existing products in collaboration with other stakeholders
Provide guidance on issues related to product design, development, and deployment, for product portfolios
Design monetization strategies to scale products into revenue-drivers for the organisation




Remuneration﻿




﻿﻿RM ﻿ 15,000 - RM 20,000; Negotiable




Consultant In Charge

Title: Senior Game Designer
Job_Description:
Job Overview:




We are looking for a Senior Game Designer with a focused design background in creature, enemy, and boss design. Our designers will also be responsible for providing prototypes of systems to quickly prove functionality in early development as well as documentation of those systems and exploring how those systems can be used in other titles being developed at the company.




Essential Job Responsibilities:




Design and implement AI and creature behavior in close collaboration with programmers, artists and production
Act as a technical expert on AI and creature design. Ensure clear understanding of the designed system and how other team members use them during implementation
Have a comprehensive knowledge of creature design and AI design
Help test new features and tools before they are used by the rest of the team
Provide prototypes and documentation of gameplay features as they are developed
Serve as a role model and subject-matter reference for junior designers




The above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job and should not be construed as an all-inclusive list of position responsibilities.




Required Qualifications & Skills




Minimum 3-5 years in game design, scripting or gameplay programming
Must have shipped a minimum of 1 title as a creature designer
Curiosity and drive to understand how things work
Solid analytical and problem-solving skills
Adaptability, autonomy, proactivity
Structure, attention to detail, efficiency
Ability to clearly express ideas (spoken and written)
Ability to understand and communicate in technical language
User focus
Programming/scripting experience

Title: Sr Experience Designer [Remote]
Job_Description:
ABOUT US:

Braintrust is the only network that gives in-demand talent all the freedom of freelance with all the benefits, community and stability of a full-time role. As the first decentralized talent network, our revolutionary Web3 model ensures the community that relies on Braintrust to find work are the same people who own and build it through the blockchain token, BTRST. So unlike other marketplaces that take 20% to 50% of talent earnings, Braintrust allows talent to keep 100% of earnings and to vote on key changes to improve the network. Braintrust is working to change the way freelance works – for good.

JOB TYPE: Freelance, Contract Position (no agencies/C2C - see notes below)
LOCATION: Remote - United States only (TimeZone: EST | Partial overlap)
HOURLY RANGE: Our client is looking to pay $100 – $125/hr
ESTIMATED DURATION: 40h/week - Long term


THE OPPORTUNITY

US ONLY (no exception)

Preferred locations: Charlotte, San Francisco, Boston, NYC, LA, and Atlanta with hybrid work arrangements (in office 3 days a week)

What You’ll Be Working On

However, open to strong remote candidates.

A common purpose guides: to help make financial lives better by connecting clients and communities to the resources they need to succeed. Our Client’s Experience Design (XD) team creates world-class end-to-end digital experiences that are intuitive, innovative, engaging and inclusive.

They are a multi-disciplinary design organization with expertise across product design, user experience, conversational/AI design, creative direction, ux research and user testing, design program management, production design, content strategy, copywriting, and design technology.

The team is constantly defining, iterating, solving problems, and working together to find ways all their digital platforms can empower customers to reach their financial goals by designing and delivering next-level experiences that provide ease, convenience and safety while matching to individual needs and preferences.

As a Senior Designer you will

Design, optimize and deliver useful and elegant best-in-class digital experiences working from a multidisciplinary, holistic perspective from concept to execution and implementation – applying a broad range of product design capabilities across user experience and visual design to craft complete product and experience solutions
Partner with a diverse set of project stakeholders and cross-functional teams – including product management and engineering. Build influence and partnerships with stakeholders outside of ongoing project work.
Collaborate with researchers, technologists, designers and delivery managers across the team
Develop and deliver advanced experience design deliverables across the discovery and delivery design workflow with limited oversight, including: information architectures, user flows, wireframes, high fidelity designs, compositions, design specifications, redlines and prototypes. Deliver exemplary solutions leveraging internal and external best practices and methods.
Design digital experiences across web, mobile web, and native apps (iOS and Android)
Support and leverage evaluative testing across the customer journey, from rapid user testing to usability studies.
Evaluate and benchmark existing product and service experiences.
Participate actively in design critique and be available as a mentor and resource to other designers
Work on multiple complex designs/projects, managing time and expectations with stakeholders across the organization and XD, staying knowledgeable on project and product details. Drive timely, quality delivery by managing multiple projects and actively providing status updates to XD and partner management.
Respect standards, reflect their design system patterns in work and champion best practices while also helping us set visions for innovative digital and technology experiences.
Use excellent visual, communication and storytelling skills. Demonstrate thought leadership by challenging the status-quo, present independently and navigate questions, conceive, pitch, execute creative ideas, patterns and standards.


You’re a Person Who Has (required Skills)

5+ years of industry design experience operating as an end-to-end multidisciplinary product designer, with strong capabilities across a range of design disciplines with a portfolio of designs that you’re proud of
Extensive experience designing multi-channel consumer-facing apps, responsive web and websites including complex system, user, ecommerce and transactional experiences
Expert understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices and rapid ideation processes like Lean UX, Design Sprints, and Agile
A track record for working with cross-functional product development and design teams to ship customer-facing digital products
Ability to design with a design system and within brand guidelines
Experience defining and utilizing quantitative and qualitative data to inform and inspire design
Highly proficient with InVision and Sketch
Financial services experience a plus


And you are a person who:

Is a self-motivated problem solver with a strong work ethic, reliable issue resolution and time management skills with an intense focus on achieving results
Works well with others, builds and nurtures strong relationships and fosters a diverse and inclusive environment
Has a track record of maximizing impact, leading design work, being reflective and inspiring others to do their best work
Has a strong interest in, and aptitude for self-learning new design and technology skills
Demonstrates strong listening, with excellent communication, and presentation skills
Adapts quickly and positively to change


Apply Now!

ABOUT THE HIRING PROCESS:

Qualified candidates will be invited to do a screening interview with the Braintrust staff. We will answer your questions about the project, and our platform. If we determine it is the right fit for both parties, we'll invite you to join the platform and create a profile to apply directly for this project.

C2C Candidates: This role is not available to C2C candidates working with an agency. If you are a professional contractor who has created an LLC/corp around their consulting practice, this is well aligned with Braintrust and we’d welcome your application.

Braintrust values the multitude of talents and perspectives that a diverse workforce brings. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or protected veteran status.

Title: REMOTE AI Programmer – AAA Unreal Action RPG Game
Job_Description:
OPM’s client is a record-breaking indie studio based in Nice, France. They are currently seeking a Gameplay Programmer to join development on their new title.

Research and build AI elements that will best enhance the game

Fluent in English

Title: Research Scientist Intern, AI Applied Research - Speech Recognition (PhD)
Job_Description:
We are looking for Research Scientist Interns to join the Meta AI Speech teams in Menlo Park, Seattle, New York City. These teams at Meta create spoken language technology to make it faster and easier for people to build community and connect with others around the world. We are part of the AI for Reality Labs research organization, whose mission is to conduct product-motivated research in ML/AI and design, develop and deploy state of the art algorithms to the rest of Meta. We work in all aspects of AI for speech and audio processing, including speech recognition, speech synthesis, speaker identification, keyword spotting, and acoustic event detection. Our work is largely focused on the areas of voice interfaces, including speech technologies for RayBan Stories, Portal devices, Oculus VR headsets, Augmented Reality, the Metaverse, and video understanding, including transcription, captioning, and content understanding. As a Research Scientist Intern, you will help us develop innovative models and algorithms and apply them to large-scale production speech tasks. Our teams at Meta AI offer twelve (12) to twenty-four (24) weeks long internships and we have various start dates throughout the year. To learn more about our research, visit https://research.facebook.com.




Research Scientist Intern, AI Applied Research - Speech Recognition (PhD) Responsibilities:




Perform research to advance the science and technology of intelligent machines
Develop novel and accurate speech algorithms and systems, leveraging deep learning and machine learning on big data resources
Contribute research that can be applied to Meta product development
Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of various deployed systems
Collaborate with team members from prototyping to production




Minimum Qualifications:




Currently has, or is in the process of obtaining a PhD degree
Must obtain work authorization in country of employment at the time of hire, and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment
Experience in C/C++ and Python
Experience in deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow)
Research and/or work experience in machine learning, deep learning, and/or speech technology




Preferred Qualifications:




Experience manipulating and analyzing complex, high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying sources
Proven track record of achieving results as demonstrated by grants, fellowships, patents, as well as first-authored publications at workshops or conferences such as Interspeech, ICASSP or similar
A strong interest in theoretical and empirical research and for answering hard questions with research
Interpersonal experience: cross-group and cross-culture collaboration
Ability to stay in touch with the literature of a particular domain and has the ability to reproduce results if needed
Experienced with training deep neural networks for key Speech tasks such as speech recognition, speech translation, speech synthesis, speaker diarization, sentiment analysis, acoustic event recognition, wake word, scene understanding, etc.
Intent to return to degree-program after the completion of the internship/co-op




Facebook is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.Facebook is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for candidates with disabilities in our recruiting process. If you need any assistance or accommodations due to a disability, please let us know at accommodations-ext@fb.com.

Title: Marketing Manager - Smart Device
Job_Description:
Smart Device & Sensor Marketing Manager – Socionext America – Milpitas, CA




Description




Socionext America Inc. (SNA)




Socionext Inc., world’s second largest ASIC provider of designs, develops and delivers System-on-Chip solutions to global customers. The company is focused on datacenter networking, storage, server, artificial intelligence and other dynamic technologies that drive today’s leading-edge applications. Socionext combines world-class expertise, experience, and an extensive IP portfolio to provide differentiating solutions. Founded in 2015, Socionext Inc. is headquartered in Shin-Yokohama, and has offices in Japan, United States, Asia and Europe to conduct its sales, marketing and product development activities.

We are seeking a Marketing Manager for our Smart Device & Sensor business.

The primary responsibilities include but are not limited to:

Maintain knowledge of current market trends, create consumer and automotive market technology insights, identify and analyze market opportunities for Socionext Smart Device & Sensor business.
Develop the Market Requirements Document (MRD) – capturing the requirements deemed critical for market acceptance, including the cross-section of customer needs and input, evolving systems requirements, latest market and industry technology trends, as well as competitive benchmarking and analysis.
Work closely with US team and Japan-based business units to drive feasibility, business case analysis and creation of technical and commercial proposals for customer engagements
Develop customer-facing technical collateral including presentations, white papers, web content to promote Socionext solutions
Work closely with management, engineering and strategic sales teams to drive all phases of customer design wins, from pre-sales through execution to mass production
Develop and maintain strong business relationships with current clients and key accounts.
Provide insights and solutions to resolve any internal and external sales obstacles.

Requirements for this position:

Bachelor’s Degree in EE, Masters preferred
5+ years of successful experience in marketing, business development and closing business
6+ years of experience with ASIC design, R&D, product marketing or application engineering role.
Requires an excellent understanding of ASIC design and manufacturing flows, including a good grasp of the competitive landscape
Good understanding of sensors such as Radar, PIR, and others
Good understanding of smart device/Edge AI design trends and competitive landscape
Good understanding of Arm platform architectures, AI/ML & GPUs, High Speed interfacing (PCIe, Ethernet, MIPI etc), Video & Image Signal Processing, chiplets and 2D/3D packaging technology.
Ability to guide products through development, including the definition and trade off analysis of architectures and new features for the components required for media encoder/decoder ASIC and edge AI co-processor.
Ability to lead with varied goals and objectives to achieve business unit’s direction and purpose
Ability to use financial tools such as ROI and NPV analysis to build solid business cases.
Teamwork, dedication, strong communications and interpersonal skills
Some travel ~10%, domestic and international as required

Title: Researcher PHD Student
Job_Description:
Ph.D. Position in Design Thinking and Artificial Intelligence

About the position 

A full-time doctoral research position is open under the co-supervision of Prof. Hernan Casakin and Dr. Jonathan Dortheimer as part of the Architectural Artificial Intelligence Research Lab (AAIRL) at Ariel University (Israel). The fellowship is funded for 48 months with a stipend of 372,000K NIS (84,000 NIS for the first year and 96,000 NIS for each year that follows).




Research topics can include:

AI and Design thinking (ideation, creativity, and framing)
Human-computer interaction with design systems
AI-augmented Design (design generation, communication, and evaluation)
Teamwork and collective intelligence

What we require 

We seek candidates with a profound interest in design thinking and artificial intelligence with solid motivation, curiosity, passion, and creativity. A successful candidate should have the following: 

Master's degree with Thesis (graduate level) in architecture, industrial design, media informatics, information science, psychology, management, or design-related fields. Minimum grade 85.
Excellent communication skills in English.
Experience in design practice is an advantage.

About Ariel University 

Ariel University (AU) comprises eight faculties/schools that offer studies in over 33 different departments. AU is also home to an integrative brain science center, a cyber technology center, an applied cancer research center, a center for robotics research and applications, a homeland security R&D center, a world-renowned materials research center, and the Schlesinger Center for Radiation Sources and Applications (FEL – free-electron laser particle accelerator). During the doctoral studies at AU, the successful candidate will interact with other young and promising researchers, will be exposed to new and cutting-edge equipment and technology, and will be infused by the pioneering spirit of a young academic institution.

General Information 

Location: Ariel / Tel Aviv, Israel 
Duration of contract: Up to 4 years 
Ph.D. Supervisors: Prof. Hernan Casakin and Dr. Jonathan Dortheimer

Benefits package 

Stipend
Preferred dormitories on campus (optional) 
Teaching employment at the Ariel School of Architecture (optional) 
Possibility of partially remote working and flexible working hours 
Social, cultural, and sports events and activities 

How to apply 

The application should include the following: 

Motivation letter
Curriculum Vitae (CV), including publications
Copies of all academic diplomas (Bachelor, Master) 

 Send the application via email to jonathand@ariel.ac.il

Evaluate and benchmark existing product and service experiences.
Participate actively in design critique and be available as a mentor and resource to other designers
Work on multiple complex designs/projects, managing time and expectations with stakeholders across the organization and XD, staying knowledgeable on project and product details. Drive timely, quality delivery by managing multiple projects and actively providing status updates to XD and partner management.
Respect standards, reflect their design system patterns in work and champion best practices while also helping us set visions for innovative digital and technology experiences.
Use excellent visual, communication and storytelling skills. Demonstrate thought leadership by challenging the status-quo, present independently and navigate questions, conceive, pitch, execute creative ideas, patterns and standards.


You’re a Person Who Has (required Skills)

5+ years of industry design experience operating as an end-to-end multidisciplinary product designer, with strong capabilities across a range of design disciplines with a portfolio of designs that you’re proud of
Extensive experience designing multi-channel consumer-facing apps, responsive web and websites including complex system, user, ecommerce and transactional experiences
Expert understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices and rapid ideation processes like Lean UX, Design Sprints, and Agile
A track record for working with cross-functional product development and design teams to ship customer-facing digital products
Ability to design with a design system and within brand guidelines
Experience defining and utilizing quantitative and qualitative data to inform and inspire design
Highly proficient with InVision and Sketch
Financial services experience a plus


And you are a person who:

Is a self-motivated problem solver with a strong work ethic, reliable issue resolution and time management skills with an intense focus on achieving results
Works well with others, builds and nurtures strong relationships and fosters a diverse and inclusive environment
Has a track record of maximizing impact, leading design work, being reflective and inspiring others to do their best work
Has a strong interest in, and aptitude for self-learning new design and technology skills
Demonstrates strong listening, with excellent communication, and presentation skills
Adapts quickly and positively to change


Apply Now!

ABOUT THE HIRING PROCESS:

Qualified candidates will be invited to do a screening interview with the Braintrust staff. We will answer your questions about the project, and our platform. If we determine it is the right fit for both parties, we'll invite you to join the platform and create a profile to apply directly for this project.

C2C Candidates: This role is not available to C2C candidates working with an agency. If you are a professional contractor who has created an LLC/corp around their consulting practice, this is well aligned with Braintrust and we’d welcome your application.

Braintrust values the multitude of talents and perspectives that a diverse workforce brings. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or protected veteran status.

Title: Software Engineer
Job_Description: Moog Space and Defense  produces spaceflight hardware and software solutions, integrating vehicle design, component design and engineering services for aerospace, scientific, commercial and military customers on four continents. From proposal phase to ground testing, launch and on-orbit operations, we support each mission as scientific, technical and operational facilitators. On the product side, our radiation-hardened avionics and electronics include GPS/GNSS receivers, science payloads, motor controllers, high-quality flight-critical components, and single board computers powered by the next-generation BRE440 “system-on-a-chip” – the world’s highest-performance radiation-hardened microprocessor.With global product demand and mission criteria moving toward integrated commercial partnerships, lower costs and higher performance hardware and software requirements, Moog Broad Reach is positioned for growth in the new era of aerospace development. Our team of seasoned architects and engineers is dedicated to partnership with our customers for continued growth and success. GENERAL FUNCTION: Under the direction of the Engineering Manager, the  Software Engineer  is responsible for the development of software applications, support of existing software, and customer support regarding software applications. This position interfaces with high level personnel from Moog, our customers, and partners. NATURE AND SCOPE: This position is responsible for both development and production functions.The incumbent participates in the design of software for use within Moog products and for sale to customers as discrete products. The incumbent provides valuable input into new software product requirements and in conjunction with marketing inputs, frequently develops the specifications which direct new product design activity.This position is one of technical leadership with respect to software design. The incumbent will often work with other engineers (including suppliers) in the software design phase and will be responsible for the overall progress of the project. Since the software products will frequently be defined or suggested by external customers the incumbent must be comfortable interfacing with and coordinating with customers to achieve proper requirements and a reliable product which can be designed on schedule.The responsibilities of this position include design, development, analysis, testing, prototype and production, performance specifications and benchmarking, proposal preparation, program scheduling and reviews, customer interfacing, and producing time and cost estimates.This position may assist in training less experienced engineering personnel and at times may have one or more people assigned to him/her for this purpose. Participation in various training activities is also required for the incumbent to remain current in their field. POSITION ATTRIBUTES: The incumbent should possess the following required experience: A BS in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent program and at least five years’ experience is required.  High level of competence in the C, C++, Python, and machine learning/AI design languages.  High level of competence in software design including application development, graphical user interface design and algorithm development.  Capable of creating low level software design requirements from high level specifications.  Capable of architecting and designing complex software packages including Linux device drivers.  High level of familiarity with Linux and its associated programming languages and constructs.  Ability to create software test code as standalone modules.  Ability to write Python or C++ code to implement mathematical algorithms.  Capable of utilizing packages that assist in the development of complex software in Python and C++.  Experienced developing machine learning and artificial intelligence using convolutional neural network constructs.  Capable of using ML/AI packages such as Tensor Flow, Pandas, and Keras.  Experienced using OpenCV and other image processing applications.  Experienced in Python packages such as NumPy and SciPy.  Capable of utilizing Scikit-learn machine learning libraries for development of ML applications.  Understanding of the Linux operating system, Linux kernel operation and design and Linux device driver creation.  Familiar with agile software development methods and is comfortable executing within those methods.  ACCOUNTABILITIES:  Functions as lead engineer on programs assigned and acts as the subject matter expert.  Represents Moog at customer meetings and may be required to travel to a customer location for short periods (1-2 days).  Reviews customer specifications or requirements and prepares technical proposal information. Also responsible for the development of engineering cost estimates.  Initiates applications of new technology and processes into software design/production.  Generates design concepts, design trade‑off studies and prepares presentations for design or customer reviews.  Interacts frequently with customers, business partners and vendors coordinating technical, cost and product matters.  Follows and oversees initial build and production software through procurement, fabrication, and test phases.  Reviews, writes, and approves necessary documentation. As necessary, the incumbent will initiate design reviews which will include representatives from design and manufacturing (inside and outside vendors/partners when applicable).  The incumbent will produce design documentation such as technical reports, user manuals, and data sheets for software products.  Designs complex software using modern design methods to include agile methods.  The incumbent will be required to effectively communicate and convince people, customers, management, and vendors, on the relative merits of various issues.  Keep current in the technology and informed of new processes, methods and advances in applicable fields. This position requires access to United States Export Controlled information.EOE/AA Minority/Female/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Disability/Veteran
Industry: Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing, Defense and Space Manufacturing, and Aviation and Aerospace Component Manufacturing

Title: 资深技术策划, VALORANT/Technical Product Manager, VALORANT
Job_Description:
作为一个资深的技术策划，你会对产品的流水线进行制定，调整，管理，以及优化，来提升玩家的体验。你的分析能力，对玩家的洞察力，以及创造力都将极大的提升游戏内外的玩家体验，甚至来震到他们。这是不是很酷呢？




你会和不同部门的伙伴合作，和他们肩并肩，为他们制作工具，或者一起来创造和实现玩家为中心的设计，你的成果可能会点亮全世界上百万玩家的心灵。




瓦罗兰特是拳头推出的一款战术射击游戏（可以点击这里来了解更多瓦罗兰特相关信息click here!）作为一个瓦罗兰特中国团队的资深技术策划，你会面对，制作，解决各种各样瓦罗兰特相关的问题和功能，其中包含新模式，新系统，等等等等。你需要对射击游戏有广泛的了解和基础，你需要能够面对各种可能的任务。你会帮助中国瓦罗兰特团队来解决技术问题，制作工具，建立流程，以及技术上e帮助其他策划实现他/她的目标。




你会汇报给瓦罗兰特的中国研发负责人




虽然这是一个产品，策划相关的岗位，但是它确实的需要你有技术竞争力。




职责：




流程管理：




消除限制团队生产能力的壁垒，让团队制作能力得以加速，如果需要，建立新的工作流
构建策划制作的工具和工作流，识别其中可能的问题，并且进行解决




拓宽产品愿景：




明辨解决方案如何对产品产生的长期影响，了解设计对玩家生态能够产生的长期作用。可以做出对产品产生正向影响的设计，并且可以为此制作原型。
与程序和策划进行合作来探索更多的设计空间
创造并提供多种可能的设计解决方案，并且能够衡量和说明不同方案的利弊




技术实现




和其他部门一起合作把内容和功能从概念到成品推向玩家
负责并且对一个设计中代码相关的部分设立目标
对瓦罗兰特进行playtest，并且帮助团队对已有的内容进行改进
帮助其他策划来对内容或者功能以最有效的方案来实现，并且递交上线
帮助策划确定工具的形式和优劣。




核心要求：




和计算机科学相关的本科/学士的学位要求，或者有与之相当的经历
至少5年的游戏策划经验
至少比较完整的参与过一款线上竞技游戏开发
至少在一个动作游戏的开发中担任过技术相关岗位（技术策划，程序，TA皆可）
对Unreal4拥有足够的知识，熟悉蓝图
可以独立设计并实现一个系统或者机制
可以用已有的机制去实现创新的内容，或者可以对一个已有的效果进行反向工程




期望要求：




熟悉在线射击竞技游戏，最好是对瓦罗兰特有足够的了解
对产品有一定的理解能力，能够了解一个设计会如何深远的影响玩家感受
对AI设计和制作有了解优先
对3C设计和制作，以及动画技术有了解优先
2年以上的C++经验优先




As a Technical Product Manager, you will manage prodcutiopn pipeline, influence, tweak, and optimize the player experience. Your analytical skills, player insight, and creativity aid in crafting in- and out-of-game experiences that engage and surprise players. You will collaborate with interdisciplinary teams and work with every tool at hand to innovate and iterate player-focused designs that'll delight millions around the world.




VALORANT is Riot’s take on a character-based tactical shooter (for more info on VALORANT click here!). As a Technical Product Manager III working on the VALORANT CN team you will be handling various aspects of VALORANT features which may include competition system, modes, etc. You need a broad knowledge of Shooting games and be ready for versatile missions.You will help with the technical capabilities of the VAL CN Production team, helping to build tools, process and help other designers with different technical aspects.




You will report to the Production lead in China.




While this is primarily a Product role - the requirements also include engineering competency.




Responsibilities




Management of Pipeline:




Breaks down barriers that inhibit the team's ability to accelerate, and build new workflows when needed.
Identifies and architects major changes to designer tools and workflows independently.




Embroad Product Vision




Sees how solutions impact the long-term success of the product. Measure Designs lead to long term player engagement. Individual designs impact the overall product in a positive way. Script and prototype shippable content and features
Seek opportunities for new design spaces in collaboration with Engineers and Design Leadership.
Create and provide multiple potential designs and solutions. Articulate trade-offs and risks between different options.




Technical Execution




Work with other disciplines to take content and features from conception to our players’ hands.
Owns and sets vision over design relevant portions of the code for their team.
Playtest VALORANT and help push for continued improvements for existing designs and fresh prototypes.
Assist other designers in optimal ways of building content and features that allow us to develop quickly and efficiently now and in the future.
Help identity and put in place tools, processes and best practices that set the design team and their collaborators up for success.




Required Qualifications




Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent experience
5+ years of experience in professional Game Design
Shipped or worked on at least one published online competitive or Action game
At least act as Technical Role(Designer/ Engineer/TA) in one Action game.
Extensive knowledge of Unreal 4 technologies, familiarity with Blueprints
Can create and improve complex systems with attention to the player impacts and downstream effects
Can use existing frameworks to develop novel solutions and reverse-engineer designs




Desired Qualifications




Passionate about the competitive or tactical shooter genres
Familiarity with online shooters, especially VALORANT and/or tactical shooters
Ability to predict outcomes of game design decisions on players and other content
Experience with AI design and execution will be a good plus
Experience with 3C framework or Animation technology will be a good plus
2+ years experience developing in C++ with the ability to create code contributions in specific parts of a complex codebase.




Our Perks




Riot has a focus on work/life balance, shown by our open paid time off policy, in addition to other perks such as flexible work schedules. We offer medical, dental, and life insurance, parental leave for you, your spouse/domestic partner and children and a 401k with company match. Check out our benefits pages for more information.




Riot Games fosters a player and workplace experience that values teamwork embodied by the Community Code. Our culture embraces differences as a strength, and our values are the guiding principles for how we approach work. We are committed to putting diversity and inclusion (D&I) at the center of everything we do, and promoting a fair and collaborative culture where Rioters treat one another with dignity and respect. We encourage you to read more about our value of thriving together and our ongoing work to build the most inclusive company in gaming




It's our policy to provide equal employment opportunities for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles' Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).
Industry: Software Development, Technology, Information and Internet, and Computer Games

Title: Senior Product Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Job_Description:
Senior Product Designer

-----------------------------------------------------

renovai is a promising, fast-growing Visual AI Design start-up providing visual commerce solutions for lifestyle brands.  We leverage computer vision and deep learning to decipher decades of design methodology, translated to cutting-edge solutions, improving metrics for all the global online leaders we partner with.  

 

We continue to grow and are looking for a motivated and experienced Product designer to join our fast-paced team, own the UX/UI and shape and craft our game-changer products in our mission to reshape online shopping experiences. The ideal candidate is comfortable in complex problem spaces, advocate for users in all design decisions, and has experience utilizing data visualizations within user interfaces.

 

Responsibilities/ what you’ll do

Own the end-to-end UX/UI design process.
Conduct research, characterization, and design on an ongoing basis.
Transform data, requirements, and research into actionable flows and designs.
Promote your ideas and decisions by presenting them cross-functionally, effectively articulating their rationale to gather stakeholders' buy-in.
Build and test wireframes, flows, mockups, and prototypes.
Provide design support throughout the product development, from initial concept to launch and post-release.
Conduct QA evaluations.
Contribute to evolving our design system and UX strategy.

Requirements:

3+ years of demonstrated experience as a UX/UI designer of high-quality mobile and web software products.
Experience collaborating closely with R&D and development teams.
Profound experience in designing customer-facing systems as well as in complex admin systems.
Up-to-date knowledge of best practices, developments, and trends in web and native mobile design.
Experience working with Figma components.
Self-directed, confident, and excited to work in a fast-paced environment.
Fluent in English, both written and spoken.
Please add a link to your portfolio that demonstrates the relevant skills.

Title: Research Domain Lead, AIDA
Job_Description:
Role Summary




Do you want to make an impact on patient health around the world through the power of data science, analytics, and engineering? Are you an innovative leader who thrives in a fast-paced environment?




Then join Pfizer Digital’s Artificial Intelligence, Data, and Analytics (AIDA) organization, where we are powering advanced analytics and AI/ML to transform how we create breakthroughs that change patients’ lives. AIDA’s mission is to accelerate, elevate, and scale AI/ML across Pfizer to drive significant business value through evidence-based, data-driven decision-making. We are Pfizer’s thought leaders on AI and its practical application, and we power advanced analytics across the enterprise by providing the foundations, expertise, and standards/policies to enable responsible AI to thrive.




The AIDA Research Domain Lead will serve as a strategic thought partner and key point of contact to the Research organization within R&D to help them harness the power of data & analytics and the skills, tools, and expertise available within AIDA. Utilizing their deep knowledge of Research/Drug Discovery and expertise in advanced analytics & AI, the Domain Lead will partner with the Research organization, WRDM1 Digital Client Partner, and GRaDEM2 Creation Center to shape, prioritize and oversee the delivery of a portfolio of mission-critical data and analytics projects and foundations. Within AIDA, the Domain Lead will proactively serve to translate Research and Discovery needs into a cohesive data and analytics strategy and drive partnership and alignment across AIDA domains. This role will also serve as AIDA’s representative to the broader Pfizer Digital organization for any Research-related activities that Pfizer Digital is addressing. The Research Domain Lead and other Domain Leads will report to the Head of AIDA and serve as global leaders in the organization, including supporting continuous advancement and innovation in data engineering processing, flow, platforms, utilization, and advanced analytics capabilities. The ideal candidate must have a strong strategic perspective and desire to push the boundaries through the application of state-of-the-art AI/ML methodologies.




1 Worldwide Research, Development and Medical




2 Global Research & Development and Medical




Role Responsibilities




Serve as the single AIDA point of contact for all Research/Discovery-related AIDA projects
Utilize expertise in Research and Drug Discovery and knowledge of data, analytics, and AI to design the most valuable solutions, advise stakeholders, and ensure implementation of the most practical approaches that achieve the desired outcomes
Connect the dots across Research/Discovery needs and develop a cohesive strategy that serves those needs efficiently
Translate Research’s data and analytics needs and priorities into tactical projects for AIDA to lead and advance
Document needs, constraints, and requests, and own and track progress toward project completion, business impacts, and key metrics
Marshall the right resources and expertise within AIDA to deliver data and analytics capabilities that best accelerate the research and discovery of breakthrough medicines
Establish effective partnerships with and influence leaders in other areas of Digital to collectively deliver on discrete projects and larger programs
Illustrate the “art of the possible” and proactively propose ideas, innovative approaches, use cases, or external collaborations that Research might find valuable
Foster collaboration across AIDA, Digital, and other colleagues to identify and communicate strategic lessons learned and best practices, promoting continuous improvement in Research project execution
Partner with other Domain Leads to develop best practices, learn from each other, and evolve the role, with the goal of delivering transformational impact to the organization
Maintain an active external network in the life sciences AI/ML community to understand state of the art capabilities and potential impacts to Pfizer R&D




Basic Qualifications




13+ years of experience working in the Research function within a biopharmaceutical company or serving the Research function as a management consultant or service provider
Advanced degree in a scientific, biomedical, or engineering discipline
Working knowledge of bioinformatics, computational biology, and AI/ML
Deep understanding of biopharmaceutical R&D data including “omics” data, screening data, pre-clinical assay data, chemical data, and protein structure data, and ability to formulate data strategy
Nuanced insight into the opportunities and challenges presented with applying AI/ML to business problems within the life sciences industry
Ability to translate ambiguous customer needs into tangible and achievable strategy and plans
Proactive, agile, and innovative leader, who can creatively solve problems and operate effectively in a rapidly evolving, varied environment (e.g., technical and business, executive and non-executive audiences)
Track record of successful internal and/or external program management and strategic planning, working with highly matrixed teams within health, medical, life science or related organizations
Strategic mindset, including the ability to prioritize tasks and projects, identify the most relevant parameters driving a business decision, and to focus the work accordingly
Very strong organizational skills, ability to successfully deliver with cross-functional, matrixed teams on multiple projects at the same time, and ability to influence without direct authority
Strong written and verbal communication, interpersonal skills, and teaming ability
Candidate demonstrates a breadth of diverse leadership experiences and capabilities including: the ability to influence and collaborate with peers, develop and coach others, oversee and guide the work of other colleagues to achieve meaningful outcomes and create business impact.




Preferred Qualifications




PhD in a scientific, biomedical, or engineering discipline or an MBA
Hands-on experience shepherding a drug discovery project from target ID through candidate nomination
Demonstrated successful execution and management of multiple, simultaneous projects
Experience applying advanced analytics and AI/ML to biopharmaceutical R&D
Experience in a high-growth environment, standing up new teams and technologies




Physical/Mental Requirements




Extensive computer use, ability to work at a rapid pace, in a virtual environment.




Non-standard Work Schedule, Travel Or Environment Requirements




Some travel will be required as part of this role. Expectations around travel will vary but you will need to be capable of travel within the region and to other regions.




This role may on occasion require physical or virtual participation on a weekend, holiday, or after normal business hours.




Other Job Details:




Last Date to Apply for Job: January 19, 2023




The annual base salary for this position ranges from $185,800.00 to $297,700.00. In addition, this position offers an annual bonus with a target of 22.5% of the base salary and eligibility to participate in our share based long term incentive program. Benefits offered include a retirement savings plan, paid vacation, holiday and personal days, paid caregiver/parental and medical leave, and health benefits to include medical, prescription drug, dental and vision coverage in accordance with the terms and conditions of the applicable plans. Salary range does not apply to the Tampa, FL location.




Relocation assistance may be available based on business needs and/or eligibility.




Pfizer requires all U.S. new hires to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19 prior to the first date of employment. As required by applicable law, Pfizer will consider requests for Reasonable Accommodations.




Sunshine Act




Pfizer reports payments and other transfers of value to health care providers as required by federal and state transparency laws and implementing regulations. These laws and regulations require Pfizer to provide government agencies with information such as a health care provider’s name, address and the type of payments or other value received, generally for public disclosure. Subject to further legal review and statutory or regulatory clarification, which Pfizer intends to pursue, reimbursement of recruiting expenses for licensed physicians may constitute a reportable transfer of value under the federal transparency law commonly known as the Sunshine Act. Therefore, if you are a licensed physician who incurs recruiting expenses as a result of interviewing with Pfizer that we pay or reimburse, your name, address and the amount of payments made currently will be reported to the government. If you have questions regarding this matter, please do not hesitate to contact your Talent Acquisition representative.




EEO & Employment Eligibility




Pfizer is committed to equal opportunity in the terms and conditions of employment for all employees and job applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, gender identity or gender expression, national origin, disability or veteran status. Pfizer also complies with all applicable national, state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act and IRCA. Pfizer is an E-Verify employer.




Information & Business Tech

Title: Associate Director, Automated Synthesis
Job_Description:
Exscientia is an AI-driven pharmatech company committed to discovering, designing and developing the best possible drugs in the fastest and most effective manner. Exscientia developed the first-ever functional precision oncology platform to successfully guide treatment selection and improve patient outcomes in a prospective interventional clinical study, as well as to progress AI-designed small molecules into the clinical setting. Our pipeline demonstrates our ability to rapidly translate scientific concepts into precision-designed therapeutic candidates, with more than 25 projects underway. By designing better drugs, faster, we believe the best ideas of science can rapidly become the best medicines for patients.









The Role



Exscientia has recently embarked on an exciting new journey to build a state-of-the-art automated laboratory at Milton Science and Technology Park in Oxfordshire. This radical new facility will seamlessly align with Exscientia's proven AI-Design to realise our ‘Designed by AI - Made by Robot' vision, with a key focus on transforming drug discovery timelines and enabling rapid design-make-test cycles.




We're seeking someone to lead a team of chemistry automation specialists to develop and operate a cutting edge, AI driven automated synthesis platform. You will support the expansion of the company's toolbox of automated synthesis protocols, and troubleshoot and optimise new synthetic methodologies in line with project chemistry requirements. A key part of this role will include working with vendors to evaluate new technologies and design bespoke robotic solutions to bolster the efficiency and effectiveness of the automated synthesis platform.








As Associate Director of Automated Synthesis, you will have the opportunity to:



Be an inspiring leader to a team of chemistry automation specialists, providing your team with tools and support, whilst developing and coaching your team to maximise the potential of each individual.
Expand the company's toolbox of automated synthesis protocols, troubleshooting and optimising new synthetic methodologies whilst promoting the philosophy to encode and automate every step in the design-make-test cycle, and continually challenge the status quo.
Work alongside various vendors to evaluate new technologies and design bespoke robotic solutions to bolster the efficiency and effectiveness of the automated synthesis platform.
Work closely with our internal teams (Lab Informatics, Biology, Compound Management) to create custom in-house software solutions that maximise workflow efficiency and enable end-to-end process integration
With support from senior leadership, play a strategic role defining roadmaps and justification for future platform enhancements as we continue to grow our chemistry automation capabilities.
As the platform matures, grow your team and play an active role in recruiting new talent.








Requirements


8+ years' experience in the pharmaceutical industry, working in the field of Chemistry Automation.
Proven track record of leading high performing teams to troubleshoot, operate, and develop automated synthesis platforms, with a passion for developing individual talent and experience growing teams.
Detailed knowledge of Automated Synthesis workflows and tools, including solid/liquid handling platforms, automated reaction execution tools and automated post-reaction purification solutions.
Experience leading engineering projects and initiatives.
Strategic mindset, with experience evaluating and implementing new technologies in line with company goals.
Passion for innovation with an open-minded attitude to drug discovery technologies and enthusiasm to challenge the status-quo.

Desirable:



Experience in leading initiatives, and bringing together cross-functional teams to deliver novel in-house solutions for both hardware and software.
Detailed knowledge of scheduling software design and integration across an automated laboratory.
Experience establishing and championing best practices and ways of working in a state-of-the-art laboratory.
Understanding of the interface between chemical synthesis and AI design.



Benefits


Work together to make a positive contribution to patients by revolutionising the pharmaceutical industry through AI-driven discovery.
We will work with you to kick-start or further grow your career - from funding for professional development and conference attendance. To the opportunity to acquire valuable skills, work on problems that matter, and learn from world-class technological and scientific leaders.
Opportunity to join an inclusive, collaborative and intellectually stimulating culture
We will work with you to provide a highly competitive compensation as we continue to grow and thrive.
Our team's health and well-being is important to us we offer a generous holiday allowance, provide flexible working and remote working to encourage all of our team to manage their own work, time and life along with wellbeing and mindfulness support.
When you are in the office, you will have access to a kitchen stocked with an endless supply of food for all employees. Along with access plenty of break out areas so you can get to know the people you are working with. Some of the best ideas start with a coffee break!
Hear from our team why they enjoy working here

Title: Senior Level Designer, Missions
Job_Description:
Why PlayStation?

PlayStation isn’t just the Best Place to Play — it’s also the Best Place to Work. Today, we’re recognized as a global leader in entertainment producing The PlayStation family of products and services including PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, PlayStation®VR, PlayStation®Plus, acclaimed PlayStation software titles from PlayStation Studios, and more.

PlayStation also strives to create an inclusive environment that empowers employees and embraces diversity. We welcome and encourage everyone who has a passion and curiosity for innovation, technology, and play to explore our open positions and join our growing global team.

The PlayStation brand falls under Sony Interactive Entertainment, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Sony Corporation.

The role has the flexibility to be fully remote***


Senior Level Designer

Sony Bend Studio, renowned creator of Days Gone , Uncharted: Golden Abyss , and Syphon Filter , is seeking outstanding talent to join our passionate and creative family in crafting our next high-profile AAA console title.

We are seeking a Senior Level Designer who will contribute to the design and development of AAA products with a specialized focus on creating level designs and game play, utilizing a combination of creative and technical design skills.

Responsibilities:

Work with Game Director, Narrative Director and Design Leads to author unique, exciting experiences that ramp gameplay while delivering emotional, high-quality gameplay
Create game layouts from scratch, and work with art to iterate on existing spaces
Own and drive development of levels from concept to final shipping state, including hands-on work using population and scripting tools
Maintain game design standards and metrics
Guide and mentor other team members with an eye for quality, implementation consistency, and pragmatism
Translate user testing and internal feedback into iterative improvements
Continually raise the bar for epic level design gameplay and set-piece moments


Requirements/Education:

Game Design process knowledge including, but not limited to, story and character design, level design, AI design, player control, user interface, pacing, etc.
Advanced knowledge of scripting languages and code is preferred but not required.
Strong error checking and debug skills to help identify problems and bugs and insure the assigned design implementation tasks are always working.
Knowledge of competitive products and various genres, as well as a personal understanding of what makes games fun and entertaining.
Strong reading, writing, and comprehension skills.
Strong time management skills and the ability to create and manage your own schedule
Strong data management skills, with the ability to manage and track large amounts of data as they go through the design pipeline, with attention to naming conventions, directory structures, and other defined processes.
5+ years of experience in game development, having shipped two or more titles
One or two years of post-high school education or training


At SIE, we consider several factors when setting each role’s base pay range, including the competitive benchmarking data for the market and geographic location.

Please note that the base pay range may vary in line with our hybrid working policy and individual base pay will be determined based on job-related factors which may include knowledge, skills, experience, and location.

In addition, this role may be eligible for bonus and SIE’s top-tier benefits package that includes medical, dental, vision, matching 401(k), paid time off, wellness program and coveted employee discounts for Sony products. Click here to learn more.

This is a flexible role that can be remote, with varying pay ranges based on geographic location. For example, if you are based out of Seattle, the estimated base pay range for this role is listed below.

$90,600 — $135,800 USD

Equal Opportunity Statement:

Sony is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All persons will receive consideration for employment without regard to gender (including gender identity, gender expression and gender reassignment), race (including colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin), religion or belief, marital or civil partnership status, disability, age, sexual orientation, pregnancy or maternity, trade union membership or membership in any other legally protected category.

We strive to create an inclusive environment, empower employees and embrace diversity. We encourage everyone to respond.

PlayStation is a Fair Chance employer and qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records will be considered for employment.

For more information about our benefits, please visit our Careers site .
Industry: Software Development, Consumer Services, and Entertainment Providers

Title: Research Scientist Intern, AI Applied Research - Speech Recognition (PhD)
Job_Description:
We are looking for Research Scientist Interns to join the Meta AI Speech teams in Menlo Park, Seattle, New York City. These teams at Meta create spoken language technology to make it faster and easier for people to build community and connect with others around the world. We are part of the AI for Reality Labs research organization, whose mission is to conduct product-motivated research in ML/AI and design, develop and deploy state of the art algorithms to the rest of Meta. We work in all aspects of AI for speech and audio processing, including speech recognition, speech synthesis, speaker identification, keyword spotting, and acoustic event detection. Our work is largely focused on the areas of voice interfaces, including speech technologies for RayBan Stories, Portal devices, Oculus VR headsets, Augmented Reality, the Metaverse, and video understanding, including transcription, captioning, and content understanding. As a Research Scientist Intern, you will help us develop innovative models and algorithms and apply them to large-scale production speech tasks. Our teams at Meta AI offer twelve (12) to twenty-four (24) weeks long internships and we have various start dates throughout the year. To learn more about our research, visit https://research.facebook.com.




Research Scientist Intern, AI Applied Research - Speech Recognition (PhD) Responsibilities:




Perform research to advance the science and technology of intelligent machines
Develop novel and accurate speech algorithms and systems, leveraging deep learning and machine learning on big data resources
Contribute research that can be applied to Meta product development
Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of various deployed systems
Collaborate with team members from prototyping to production




Minimum Qualifications:




Currently has, or is in the process of obtaining a PhD degree
Must obtain work authorization in country of employment at the time of hire, and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment
Experience in C/C++ and Python
Experience in deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow)
Research and/or work experience in machine learning, deep learning, and/or speech technology




Preferred Qualifications:




Experience manipulating and analyzing complex, high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying sources
Proven track record of achieving results as demonstrated by grants, fellowships, patents, as well as first-authored publications at workshops or conferences such as Interspeech, ICASSP or similar
A strong interest in theoretical and empirical research and for answering hard questions with research
Interpersonal experience: cross-group and cross-culture collaboration
Ability to stay in touch with the literature of a particular domain and has the ability to reproduce results if needed
Experienced with training deep neural networks for key Speech tasks such as speech recognition, speech translation, speech synthesis, speaker diarization, sentiment analysis, acoustic event recognition, wake word, scene understanding, etc.
Intent to return to degree-program after the completion of the internship/co-op




Facebook is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.Facebook is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for candidates with disabilities in our recruiting process. If you need any assistance or accommodations due to a disability, please let us know at accommodations-ext@fb.com.

Title: Data Engineer
Job_Description:
Are you an experienced Data Engineer looking to join an organisation committed to placing data and technology at the heart of their business model?




As a B2B energy supplier SEFE Energy supplies thousands of businesses across the UK, France, and Netherlands. To remain competitive, we must be agile, constantly adapting to the ever-changing energy world, driven by forces of decarbonisation, competition, digitalisation and shifting customer expectations. Our Always Reaching for Better strategy equips us to respond to changes and advancements, and quickly seize opportunities to grow and develop.




Want to join us on our journey?

We are looking for someone to join our Portfolio Modelling team in Manchester. Working with key stakeholders you will help develop tailored insight into demand and portfolio forecasts across Gas, Power & Emissions.




What you will do?

In the role of Data Engineer (forecasting) you will work closely with your immediate colleagues whilst building effective working partnerships across Portfolio Management, Sales, Risk and Finance to ensure we maintain rigour and accuracy around our data modelling and produce industry leading forecasts.




Some of the key activities include

Owning, creating, maintaining, and analysing demand forecasts and associated data architectures, pipelines and datasets from existing databases, industry file flows and unique structured/unstructured sources for use across portfolio analysis and ML analytics.
Ensuring a stable and automated operating environment, with strong back up and benchmarking processes, for data analytics, visualization, quality assurance, report content monitoring and issue resolutions.
Liaising with the Data Scientists/Architects/Quants and Portfolio Quants to ensure tier one insight into portfolio EBITDA performance, customer metrics, price and fundamental influences, and external portfolio impacts.
Dealing with the discovery of new structured and unstructured data sources from internal systems, industry APIs/web scraping/file flows, Counterparty news sources and market participant data sets.
Using ML tools and statistical techniques to assist data science projects in systemising data analysis, deployed production environments and effective decision making
Input into R&D for concept and prototype development across the desk, department and business for data mining and data-gathering techniques leading into ML/AI design and forecast data visualization.
Taking the lead with Sales channels on ensuring marketing volume and growth exposure are forecast correctly.
Guarantee key stakeholders of Execution Desk, Portfolio Strategy and Logistics have transparency over all the portfolio forecasts and a full scenario analysis of portfolio distribution.
Working with Logistics, Portfolio Modelling and Risk to ensure assumptions, data calibration and visualization for portfolio and deal parameters are up to date, accurately modelled and reconciled.
Contributing to the business progressively implementing strategy sheets to tier 4 portfolio level ensuring a degree of quant proficiency across the mental model frame up, back testing and returns profiling.




What you’ll bring to the role?

You will be experienced in systemizing financial data flows and producing analysis across both structured and unstructured data. You will have achieved this through gaining experience with weather, commodities, fixed income, financial services, or another applicable industry.




You will demonstrate the following

Object orientated programming, with python expertise to a proficient level to support data manipulation libraries/package management/web frameworks (eg Pandas/Dask, Numpy/Scipy, Matplotlib/seaborn/plotly, pip/conda, flask/Django)
SQL, SQLAlchemy and Alembic expertise
Machine Learning and AI techniques, micro service architectures such as Docker/Kubernetes and Windows Servers, Elastic Search (ELK Stack) and IIS Web Hosting (desirable)
Understanding of front-end web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React, Angular or Vue) and visualization platforms e.g. PowerBI / Tableau and Azure DevOps flow board (desirable)
Commodity portfolios ‘beta’ and ‘alpha’ (desirable)
Demonstratable ability to perform in trading / portfolio management / financial services / research
Fluency in business English (essential) together with an additional language - French, German, Spanish, Italian (desirable)




Our offer to you

In return we offer a competitive starting salary supported by a comprehensive, and broad reaching benefits package which includes




bonus earning potential
non-contributory pension
25 days holiday plus bank holidays and volunteering days
buy / sell holidays
life assurance
medical and dental insurance
range of optional flexible benefits




Based from our offices in Manchester City Centre, you can benefit from hybrid working offering the flexibility to spend some of your working week at home. Close to both Deansgate and Oxford Road railway stations and the wider travel networks our offices offer the opportunity to mix with your colleagues in person with a wide variety of creative meeting spaces. You also get the opportunity to enjoy your down time with well-equipped rest areas.




We are committed to supporting your career growth with opportunities to develop both your knowledge and experience through a blended approach to learning.




Who are we?

We are part of the SEFE Group – led by SEFE Securing Energy for Europe GmbH in Berlin – which employs approximately 1,500 employees. The 350 people working in SEFE Energy are friendly and positive – you can approach anyone for help and your ideas are always welcome. We’re committed to our REACH principles – Results, Expertise, Action, Challenge, Have courage – but above all else, we care for each other’s welfare and aspirations and above all offer support as your career develops.




Our focus for 2022 – 2025 is strategic, profitable growth and strengthening our foundations, primarily by placing data and technology at the heart of our business model. We’re looking for people who are passionate about where we’re going and will help us thrive long into the future.




We’re committed to creating an inclusive environment that embraces diversity and fosters the development of knowledge, skills, and experience, so all our people can thrive and prosper in their careers with us. We are a place where you can be yourself and make your mark because whatever your role, you’ll find an open, welcoming atmosphere that empowers you, encourages fresh thinking, and recognises your contribution.

Title: AI Design Verification Engineer
Job_Description:
WHAT YOU DO AT AMD CHANGES EVERYTHING

We care deeply about transforming lives with AMD technology to enrich our industry, our communities, and the world. Our mission is to build great products that accelerate next-generation computing experiences – the building blocks for the data center, artificial intelligence, PCs, gaming and embedded. Underpinning our mission is the AMD culture. We push the limits of innovation to solve the world’s most important challenges. We strive for execution excellence while being direct, humble, collaborative, and inclusive of diverse perspectives. This is who we are at our best. One Company. One Team.

AMD together we advance_

The Role

We are looking for a Member of Technical Staff (MTS) to join us AI engine verification San Jose Team. In this role, you will be working on the cutting-edge AI Engine, the technology offering the world’s most scalable solutions from intelligent sensor to edge compute, evolves with AI innovations in the industry.

You will be working with architects and designers to define the verification strategy for the design, develop and review test plans, execute the test plans using industry standard tools like System Verilog and UVM. You will contribute to the overall success of the product and business by ensuring high quality through detail-oriented industry standard verification leading to tape out.

The Person

Member of Technical Staff will be able to collaborate with across functional team, he/she will be a dynamic, quality-conscious, attention oriented individual with significant experience in successfully verifying and taping out complex designs with high quality.

Key Responsibilities

Will be working as a member of a cross geographic pre_silicon verification team to verify a next generation AI engine.
Will be working with design, architecture team to verify micro-architecture and design across multiple platforms
Responsible for a comprehensive verification plan and drive the implementation of verification test cases from applications and other sources
Responsible for regression, verification infrastructure development
Mentoring junior engineers


Preferred Experience

Experience in specifying and developing the verification infrastructure for verifying CPU/DSP/Vector-datapath designs
8+ years of experience in the verification with experience of CPU/Video/DSP/vector processors, SIMD is a plus.
Strong foundation in SoC architecture and verification of multi-core processors including SIMD, Vector processors, floating point, etc. is a plus
Expertise in Verilog/System Verilog, C/C++/SystemC, UVM, Scripting languages like Perl/Python, etc.
